root.name: Full Pipe
root.description: OverviewFull Pipe is a point and click adventure/puzzle game, which focuses around "the Dude". He happened to stumble into this Full Pipe world via a manhole under his bed while he was searching for his missing slipper. This game features no dialogue between the Dude and the NPCs, instead opting more for just different sounds. You explore Full Pipe without any specific objective set in place, other then to make it to the other side.GameplayThis point and click game. Simply pointing to a spot on the floor will have the Dude start walking there. Clicking on and picking up different objects and interacting with the non playable characters. Figuring out what works to make it further into the world. Portions of the game will have you relying on timing to jump, duck, and bounce your way past non playable characters.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XPProcessor: 300 MHzMemory: 64 MBHard Drive: 610 MB FreeVideo Memory: 800Ã—600 SVGASound Card: DirectX CompatibleDirectX: 8.0Keyboard MouseCD/DVD Rom Drive
